sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DelimitedText1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://sapstoracc.dfs.core.windows.net/sapcontainer/TripData - Copy.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = DelimitedText1,
  #"Replaced value" = Table.ReplaceValue(Source, "VTS", "Vessel Traffic Services", Replacer.ReplaceValue, {"vendor_id"}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Replaced value", each [store_and_fwd_flag] <> "N")
in
  #"Filtered rows";
